text: Road Trip is a 2000 American comedy movie. It was directed and cowritten by Todd Phillips. It stars Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott and Tom Green as three college boys as they take on a road trip to collect an explicit tape. ==References== Category:2000 movies Category:2000 comedy movies Category:2000s sex comedy movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Todd Phillips Category:Movies set in universities and colleges Category:Screenplays by Todd Phillips Category:Teen sex comedy movies
title: Road Trip (movie)
